docs.title: Syllabus:

docs.text: Introduction ¶ Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jose J. Valero Mas Summary ¶ In this session: We will provide an introduction to the Deep Learning field. We will introduce some points related to the more general Machine Learning area. We will explore some techniques and principles related to the Machine Learning field. We will introduce the Tensorflow-Keras and PyTorch frameworks largely considered in Deep Learning.
docs.title: Session 1

docs.text: Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jose J. Valero Mas
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: In this session: We will provide an introduction to the Deep Learning field. We will introduce some points related to the more general Machine Learning area. We will explore some techniques and principles related to the Machine Learning field. We will introduce the Tensorflow-Keras and PyTorch frameworks largely considered in Deep Learning.
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: Convolutional Neural Networks ¶ Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Antonio Javier Gallego Summary ¶ In this session: We will presents the historical context of Neural Networks. We will provide an in-depth introduction to Neural Networks. We will present a particular neural scheme: the Convolutional Neural Network.
docs.title: Session 2

docs.text: Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Antonio Javier Gallego
docs.title: Convolutional Neural Networks

docs.text: In this session: We will presents the historical context of Neural Networks. We will provide an in-depth introduction to Neural Networks. We will present a particular neural scheme: the Convolutional Neural Network.
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: Generative Adversarial Networks ¶ Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jorge Calvo Zaragoza Summary ¶ In this session: We will the neural autoencoder architecture. We will introduce the idea of generative neural models focusing on the case of Generative Adversarial Networks.
docs.title: Session 3

docs.text: Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jorge Calvo Zaragoza
docs.title: Generative Adversarial Networks

docs.text: In this session: We will the neural autoencoder architecture. We will introduce the idea of generative neural models focusing on the case of Generative Adversarial Networks.
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: Recurrent Neural Networks (I) ¶ Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jose J. Valero Mas Summary ¶ In this session: Introduction to Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN). Use of RNN in Keras.
docs.title: Session 4

docs.text: Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jose J. Valero Mas
docs.title: Recurrent Neural Networks (I)

docs.text: In this session: Introduction to Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN). Use of RNN in Keras.
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: Recurrent Neural Networks (II) ¶ Transform 4 Europe - 2022 Lecturer: Jorge Calvo Zaragoza Summary ¶ In this session: We will delve into the use of recurrent neural networks in Keras. We will introduce word embeddings . We will explain additional mechanisms that facilitate the use of RNN in Keras.
docs.title: Session 5

docs.text: In this session: We will delve into the use of recurrent neural networks in Keras. We will introduce word embeddings . We will explain additional mechanisms that facilitate the use of RNN in Keras.
